1.title: Shock & Denial
1.plot: Kyle Flanagan has nothing left but his relationship with the seemingly perfect boyfriend, Casey. But before Kyle's first group therapy session, he reveals his secret to his therapist: he is not actually gay.

2.title: Release
2.plot: After his first group session, Kyle Flanagan makes a new friend in Alex. Can Kyle balance his growing attraction to her and keep up his charade of a relationship with Casey?

3.title: Isolation
3.plot: Before meeting his family for dinner, Casey reveals his own secret he has been hiding from Kyle.

4.title: Physicality
4.plot: After his fight with Casey, Kyle visits his little sister's grave and tries to figure out what to do next. Does he break Casey's heart or keep the charade going?

imdb.plot outline: Kyle Flanagan (Robert Mitchel Owenby) has no job, no home and no family. The only thing keeping him grounded is his relationship with his boyfriend Casey Brandt (Nick Izzo). But when their relationship grows more serious and he begins to fall for a woman in his group therapy sessions, Kyle must make a decision. Does he continue to lead on his boyfriend or reveal the truth: he is not actually gay. From award-winning writer/director Braeden Orr comes the first web series from Single Serving Pictures. Starring Robert Mitchel Owenby, Nick Izzo, Christina Leidel and Amy McCoy. Produced by Braeden Orr and Meaghan Davis in conjunction with the SCAD-Atlanta Film & Television Graduate Program.
